overview: The Cat Town Story is a profile of a nonprofit cat adoption facility in Oakland that  started with an idea of approaching cat rescue differently, and ended up turning that  idea into reality. A behind the scenes look at the first cat cafe in the nation — and a  glimpse into the lives of cat owners and their cats — this documentary about second  chances explores the transformative power of compassion.
tagline: Saving man's other best friend, one fur-baby at a time.
title: The Cat Town Story
